Art. 4.164. 
Acceptance for a protected person of full age 
A gift made to a protected person who, by virtue of article 492/2 of the former Civil Code, has been declared incapable of receiving it, must be accepted by his administrator in accordance with article 499/7, ¤ 2, paragraph 1, 6¡, of the former Civil Code.
A protected person who, by virtue of article 492/1 of the former Civil Code, requires assistance to accept a gift, may accept with the assistance of his or her administrator.
